text: Bill Harris (September 1, 1934 â€“ November 27, 2017) was an American Republican politician and businessman. He was born in Fork Mountain, Tennessee. Harris served in the Ohio General Assembly, notably as President of the Ohio Senate from 2005 to 2010. He was a member of the Ohio Senate from 2000 until his retirement in 2010. Harris died on November 27, 2017 in Ashland, Ohio at the age of 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * Project Vote Smart - Bill M. title: Bill Harris
